title: Unable to build from source
body_html:
I am not able to build the current version.
Getting the following error:
pytorch/aten/src/TH/generic/THTensorLapack.c:860:7: warning: unused variable ‘n’ [-Wunused-variable]
int n = ra__->size[1];
^
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/TH/THTensor.cpp.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

I am using Anaconda as directed in the readme. I have created a conda environment and have set:
export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="/u/anaconda2/envs/pyt4/"
As specified here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/47799803/installing-from-source-within-anaconda-environment

Thanks

body:
I am not able to build the current version.
Getting the following error:
pytorch/aten/src/TH/generic/THTensorLapack.c:860:7: warning: unused variable ‘n’ [-Wunused-variable]
   int n = ra__->size[1];
       ^
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/TH/THTensor.cpp.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

I am using Anaconda as directed in the readme.  I have created a conda environment and have set:
 export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="/u/anaconda2/envs/pyt4/"
As specified here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/47799803/installing-from-source-within-anaconda-environment

Thanks
